Name: natural gas production, liquefied | natural gas, liquefied | EN15804GD, U
Category: D:Electricity, gas, steam and air conditioning supply/35:Electricity, gas, steam and air conditioning supply/352:Manufacture of gas; distribution of gaseous fuels through mains/3520:Manufacture of gas; distribution of gaseous fuels through mains
Description: During compression, the CO2 present in the natural gas mix is separated and, in general, released to the atmosphere. The practice of pump-back in the original reservoir is not common. An average value of 0.05% of leakage is taken into account (Schori et al. 2012).
